p.s: Emended description of the genus Sporosarcina Kluyver and van Niel 1936
Sporosarcina (Spo.ro.sar.ci'na. M.L. n. spora a spore; M.L. fem. n. Sarcina generic name; M.L. fem. n. Sporosarcina spore-forming Sarcina)
Oxidase-positive (not determined for Sporosarcina pasteurii but positive for the type strain of Sporosarcina pasteurii).
Catalase-positive (not determined for Sporosarcina pasteurii but positive for the type strain of Sporosarcina pasteurii).
Nitrate reduction to nitrite is variable.
The major fatty acid is ante-C15:0.
The diagnostic amino acid at position 3 of the peptide subunit of the peptidoglycan is L-lysine.
The G+Â­C content of the genomic DNA is 38-42 mol%.
The type species is Sporosarcina ureae.
